mapper.select: select grade.id id,grade.sno sno,student.sname sname,grade.cno cno,clazz.cname cname,grade.term term,grade.tno tno,teacher.tname tname,grade.usual_grade usualGrade,grade.final_grade finalGrade,grade.total_grade totalGrade from grade , student ,teacher, clazz where grade.sno = student.sno and grade.tno=teacher.tno and grade.cno = clazz.cno
